description: VolumeError captures an error encountered during a volume operation.

errorCode.description:
errorCode is a numeric gRPC code representing the error encountered during Attach or Detach operations.

This is an optional, alpha field that requires the MutableCSINodeAllocatableCount feature gate being enabled to be set.

message.description: message represents the error encountered during Attach or Detach operation. This string may be logged, so it should not contain sensitive information.

time.description: time represents the time the error was encountered.
